name: Pirate Quest: Blast Enemies and Loot Treasure!
name_original: Pirate Quest: Blast Enemies and Loot Treasure!
description:
"Are you tough enough to overcome the odds and undertake the Pirate Quest?
Pirate Quest is a blockbuster quality arcade game challenging you to battle your rivals on a quest for pirate supremacy. Raise your cannons, assemble your crew and prepare your ship for battle to go down in history as the most legendary pirate to set sail the seven seas. There are over 150 Pirate Quests for you to undertake on your way to the top, but are you pirate enough?

FEATURES
- Explore over 50 beautiful Caribbean islands by raiding towns looting treasure and sinking your rivals in epic ship battles!
- Shoot cannons, plant mines and sacrifice your crew to defend your ship.
- Visit the tavern to undertake over 150 Pirate Quests on your rise to the top!
- Conquer the 7 great Pirate clans.
- Upgrade your ship until it's the most menacing vessel to ever set sail.
- Put the other Pirate captains to shame with 1000's of ship customisation options.

*Please note – this game is free to play, however some items may be purchased for real money. If you do not want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device settings.
**This game does not support iPhone 3GS, iPad 1, iPod Touch 4th Generation or earlier devices.
